title: Do I need an umbrella?
description: Draw a balloon floating in the air using polygons!

steps.hint: Let‚Äôs get the weather with **type** `get 'weather', location`
Move up 50 to get into position for your question. **Type** `move 0, -50`
Write your text. **Type** `text 'DO I NEED AN UMBRELLA NOW?'`
steps.solution: text 'DO I NEED AN UMBRELLA NOW?'

steps.hint: Now move down to get into position for the answer with `move 0, 150`
The answer should be big, lets use `font 110`

If it is raining, we want to tell the user to grab an umbrella, but if it isn't raining, they're all good. To do this, we're going to use the `if` word. **Type** `if weather.condition.text is 'Raining'`
If it is raining, then we want to tell the user yes. We'll tell them with text and some emoji. Add the emoji using the emoji panel on the left. **Type** `then text 'YES ‚òîÔ∏è''
If it is not raining, we will just write different text. **Type** `else text 'NO üòé'
